Package mytopology

Class Topology

java.lang.Object
mytopology.Topology
public class Topology
extends java.lang.Object

Topology-API

This API provides the functionality to
  • Read a topology from a given JSON file and store it in the memory: read [filename]
  • Write a given topology from the memory to a JSON file: write [topologyID]
  • Query about which topologies are currently in the memory: getTopologies
  • Delete a given topology from memory: delete [topologyID]
  • Query about which devices are in a given topology: getDevices [topologyID]
  • Query about which devices are connected to a given netlist node in a given topology: getDevicesWithNetlistNode [topologyID] [netlistNodeID]

Since:
2021-9-27
